block.p: Katharine Howell Barefoot, a daughter of Pamela and Brian Barefoot of Summit, N.J., was married yesterday to Brian Edward Herrick, a son of Patricia and Donald Herrick of North Berwick, Me. The Rev. Paul J. Boothby, a Unitarian-Universalist minister, officiated at the Chapel of the Snows in Stratton Mountain, Vt.
Mr. and Mrs. Herrick are fourth-year students at Dartmouth Medical School, where they met. The bride, 28, graduated cum laude from Dartmouth College; the bridegroom, 26, received his B.A. from Tufts.

Katharine Howell Barefoot, a daughter of Pamela and Brian Barefoot of Summit, N.J., was married yesterday to Brian Edward Herrick, a son of Patricia and Donald Herrick of North Berwick, Me. The Rev. Paul J. Boothby, a Unitarian-Universalist minister, officiated at the Chapel of the Snows in Stratton Mountain, Vt.
Mr. and Mrs. Herrick are fourth-year students at Dartmouth Medical School, where they met. The bride, 28, graduated cum laude from Dartmouth College; the bridegroom, 26, received his B.A. from Tufts.
The bride's father is an executive vice president and the director of investment banking at PaineWebber in New York.
The bridegroom's mother retired as a librarian at Noble Junior High School in Berwick. His father is the director of management systems support at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard in New Hampshire.
